features: 【COOLING & BREATHABLE】The white part of the head contact of the pillowcase of this cube pillow is made of 100% PE microfiber cooling material, providing an incredible long-lasting cooling feeling, and the gray part of the side is made of breathable fiber material to avoid stuffiness while sleeping, providing better sleep quality.

【TWO HARDNESSES】Still confused about whether to choose a soft or hard pillow? KEHANGTE cooling cube pillow is designed with soft and firm double-sided support, the blue memory foam layer is softer than the gray memory foam layer. Unlike other two-sided designs on the market, our design incorporates ergonomics, making it a wider audience. You can choose freely according to your needs.

【BETTER SIDE SLEEPING】KEHANGTE cube pillow is perfect for side sleepers, do you often suffer from neck and shoulder pain due to improper pillow thickness or lack of support? This pillow not only won't make you suffer from discomfort, but also can relieve neck and shoulder pain caused by not getting a good side sleep. It is supportive and soft enough, the memory foam has superb resilience and fits your neck curve perfectly, which can make your side sleep sweeter. And good side sleep healthier, and has been proven to help sleep to promote blood circulation, breathing, digestion, as well as having the effect of relieving snoring and acid reflux.

【APPLICABLE PEOPLE & MULTI-PURPOSE】：:KEHANGTE cooling cube pillow can support your head, neck and shoulder, so it's perfect for head, neck and shoulder pain and snoring, acid reflux people can be relieved, and of course the same is true for side sleepers. The cooling surface material is quite comfortable for hot sleepers in many occasions, You can use our cube pillow in your bedroom and living room for daily life. It will also be your best choice when camping, outdoors, hiking and traveling.

【CUSTOMER SERVICE & IMPORTANT NOTE】: We offer 30 days return/exchange service for 100% satisfaction, contact our customer service through Amazon when needed. If you encounter a small probability event and receive a defective cube pillow, contact us promptly, we are willing to send you a new one for free without sending the old one back. Note: We use in the product packaging in line with international standards compression ratio of it compression, open the box in the air exposure for 48 hours the product can be restored intact, there will not be a long time still can not be restored, if you unpacked feel the product did not recover, be sure to wait for it 48 hours, it will surprise you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cooling Material The cooling fiber pillow cover can provide a incredible long-lasting cooling feel. it is very suitable for hot sleepers. Breathable Fibres The sides are made of breathable fabric to avoid stuffiness while sleeping and keep the pillow dry, making it very friendly to hot sleepers. Two Hardnesses KEHANGTE cooling cube pillow is designed with soft double-sided support, the blue memory foam layer is softer than the gray memory foam layer. High Quality Zipper We specially designed a disassembly pillow cover, using high -quality and smooth zipper, which is very durable.

There’s a gap between your neck and shoulder which most conventional pillows won’t fill. cube pillow gives you support for your “pillow hole” which can alleviate neck pain or shoulder pain caused by unsupportive or thin pillows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars soft and breathable pillowcase
reviews.reviewText: To prevent the pillow core from getting dirty, I chose this pillowcase for all the pillows in my house. It fits my pillows perfectly, and the surface remains smooth and wrinkle-free after putting it on. The front of the pillowcase is made of a special material that feels cool, and the side is breathable. After using this pillowcase, the pillow surface became softer and more comfortable, significantly improving my sleep quality. Additionally, this pillowcase has a zipper design, making it easy to remove and wash in the washing machine. My family also enjoys using this pillowcase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Received the pillow case. It is packed in a nice package. The actual pillow case is nice. The material is soft and comfortable. The silk felling case makes me sleep better. And the research stated the silk pillow case will improve the sleeping deepness. The silk case will reduce the fraction between hair and pillow case. Nice to have

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the cooling feature
reviews.reviewText: I love this pillow case's advanced cooling technology. The fabric is engineered to dissipate heat efficiently, providing a cool and refreshing sensation throughout the night. This feature is a great for me who tend to sleep hot, offering a solution for maintaining optimal sleeping temperature for a restful and uninterrupted sleep. The softness of the pillow cover is immediately noticeable. The high-quality material feels gentle against the skin, creating a comfortable and cozy sleep surface. The plush texture enhances the overall sleeping experience, making it a joy to rest your head on the cooling cube pillow. The machine-washable design adds to the practicality of the pillow cover. Easy maintenance ensures that the cover remains fresh and clean with minimal effort. The durable construction withstands regular washing, maintaining its softness and cooling properties over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: This pillowcase is custom-made to fit pillows with a 24"x12"x5" cube shape, enhancing the unique benefits of this type of pillow. It is a dual-material design. The white portion is made of 100% PE microfiber, which provides protection that lasts all night for an extraordinary cooling sensation.This feature is particularly beneficial for those who are prone to overheating while sleeping. Complementing this, the gray side of the pillowcase is made of breathable fiber material, effectively preventing any feeling of stuffiness. Regardless of the season, this combination Can ensure a refreshing and comfortable sleep experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can kill a pillow in a week...
reviews.reviewText: My husband is amazed at my ability to turn any pillow flat in a week. I like to side sleep, but I also love sleeping on my back sometimes also.Typically what i do to keep my head and neck properly propped up to avoid horrible headaches is I sort of shove it under my neck and between my shoulder. I find that way my neck is held up and I do not wake up with a horrible headache from sleeping wrong (oh the fun of ageing).With this pillow I do not have to do that at all, It properly supports my head and neck on both my side and back. I do notice that one side is slightly softer then the other. I am using a pillow case on my pillow but I do enjoy if I slide my hand in while sleeping or falling asleep that the outside of the pillow is SUPER cold. It is a very nice little surprise.I was unsure if this was going to work for me honestly but I was willing to give it a try. So far so good, and even after using this for a week its not flat yet and honestly hasn't changed shape at all. This pillow is worth every cent!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars weird but good if you're a side sleeper
reviews.reviewText: I'd seen these pillows before and was unsure. You would think a cube pillow would be very uncomfortable, but if you're sleeping on your side, the corner of the cube fits nicely in that space between your neck and shoulder.When you open it, it does take a day or two for this thing to fully "inflate" (it comes sealed in a vacuum package) and fully off-gas. I'm also annoyed by the fact that a standard pillowcase doesn't really fit - it always slides off. You might want to find a pillow case with a zipper for this one.It's a memory foam pillow, so your head sinks into it nicely. Personally, I think it's a pretty high pile pillow ~3 inches or so. It's a little on the higher side for me, but not bad. This is really only good if you sleep on your side. If you sleep on your back it will be uncomfortable! If you try to use it as a cuddle pillow and put it in between your arms or legs, it will also be relatively uncomfortable. It doesn't squish well so if you're going to hold it in your arms when you sleep, it won't -squish-. It's firm as it's memory foam and meant for your head. The corners are also not great for a cuddle pillow either - I have found it's good strictly for side sleeping.It does sleep pretty cool, which is nice because you won't overheat as much. I really like this pillow, but I hate how small the use case is. It's only effective for THIS ONE THING -which is if you're a side sleeper. Since I tend to toss and turn, and I'm not always on my side, this isn't the right pillow for me, but I'm glad to have at least tried it. I think if you're struggling to find a pillow that works for you, and you're a side sleeper, I'd say try this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really love this pillow
reviews.reviewText: This pillow exceeded my expectations. Most cube/side sleeper pillows are really firm and stiff. This pillow is a very soft and impressionable memory foam. It supports my neck without being uncomfortable. I haven't been having my usual neck pains that I had with the pillow that I had bought from my chiropractor or regular store bought pillows. I've been using this pillow for about a week now and it's been an amazing improvement with my sleep and lounging experiences. It literally molds to my neck, head, and shoulders while still being supportive. It is incredibly soft both in feel and memory foam texture. It has a cooling effect that is an absolute dream for me. It feels very nice and stays cool through the night. If I reposition, the memory foam adjusts to the new impression I've made while it puffs back up to rid the old one. So, no matter if I toss and turn (due to my bad hip); I can find comfortable supportive in whatever my new position may be several times a night. This pillow has impressed me. It's quality made with nice materials. It has a great value for the price. I can, most certainly, recommend this!
